text.div:
Care Connect Diagnostic Capability Statement

Minimal conformance requirements for a Diagnostic API. This would typically be found on Patient Administration Systems and Laboratory Information Systems

ModeSERVER
Description
Transaction
System History
System Search
Resource TypeProfileReadSearchUpdateCreate
DiagnosticReporthttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-DiagnosticReportyy
Observationhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Observationyy
Specimenhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Specimenyy

name: Care Connect Diagnostic Capability Statement
description: Minimal conformance requirements for a Diagnostic API. This would typically be found on Patient Administration Systems and Laboratory Information Systems

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of report

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the report type

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique id for a particular report

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the report is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique id for a particular observation

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)
